Running script for collecting, training, testing¶

run¶

This script collects data, train, and test classifiers.

scripts.run.collect_and_save_data(n_data=1000)[source]¶

Collects title/category data from Gunosy websites

n_data : int
Number of data
scripts.run.test_classifiers()[source]¶

Test classifiers and plots comparisons

classifier_name : str
Name of the classifier Choose ‘all’ if all classifieres to be trained
accuracies : list of floats
Accuracy of each classifier
scripts.run.train_classifier(classifier_name='naive_bayes')[source]¶

Trains classifiers with collected dataset that is saved in db After the traning, it saves its parameters as pickle data.

classifier_name : str
Name of the classifier Choose ‘all’ if all classifieres to be trained
